data.what_is:
We help businesses, increase their conversion by turning customer interactions into personalized experiences, in a way everybody can do it.

Squeezely CDP helps businesses drive personalization at scale in three simple steps:
Collect - Collect data from all sources into one place.
Convert - Convert data into segments and actions , f.e. our built in Intelligent Audiences and Product Recommendations.
Capitalize - Personalized Experiences will be provided across your website, email marketing and advertising campaigns.

Strengths
Fast integration - You will be up and running in no-time
Real-time data availability - no lags
Personalization at scale -  highly-relevant and automated approach to each individual customer
Advanced machine learning technology - to ensure the best performance
Excellent support - We are here to help you along the way to accomplishing your goals

Check out our videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZlqrT5UzEtU96Q2XlEaJnA
data.product_description: Squeezely helps marketing teams create personalized experiences. Our personalization methods are helping numerous marketing teams improve their results and efficiency in a matter of weeks.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use and usefull  customer data platform with focus on personalization
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
A lot of features that help to boost our business. Personalization on our magento 2 webstore and integrated with our E-mail software. Its amazing to create Marketing journeys using all touchpoints of our customers and visitors.
Automated audiences up-to-date 24/7 we send to our Google Ads account is also a great feature.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
It costs money :) But its worth it! A great feature would be that historic data is automated uploaded from your cms (now you can with .csv).

Recommendations to others considering Spotler Activate:
Ask for a Demo and you will see all the possibilities.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can now create not only audiences but use filters and custom fields to narrow down to a specific audience and it is up-to-date. We also now have a clear view of our marketing journeys.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer:
A lot of features that help to boost our business. Personalization on our magento 2 webstore and integrated with our E-mail software. Its amazing to create Marketing journeys using all touchpoints of our customers and visitors.
Automated audiences up-to-date 24/7 we send to our Google Ads account is also a great feature.

review_question_answers.answer: We can now create not only audiences but use filters and custom fields to narrow down to a specific audience and it is up-to-date. We also now have a clear view of our marketing journeys.

initial_reviews.review_title: Squeezely helps us create personalized experiences for our customers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Squeezely gives us much freedom in creating segments and personalized experiences.
The support is also a big plus, the support is fast and they really help you get the most out of the tooling.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Somethimes you can get lost in all of the functionality, but therefore they offer good support.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Easily to set up personalisations and A/B tests. Is creates an uplift in our average order value en revenue.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer:
Squeezely gives us much freedom in creating segments and personalized experiences.
The support is also a big plus, the support is fast and they really help you get the most out of the tooling.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Somethimes you can get lost in all of the functionality, but therefore they offer good support.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Easily to set up personalisations and A/B tests. Is creates an uplift in our average order value en revenue.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
The most valuable part of Squeeely is the quick response you get on bugs or support. The team of Squeezely is very social so to contact them is always very joyful.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
The onboarding proces and the innovations are outsourced to Partners of Squeezely. The Partners are not always up-to-date by ''special issues''.  I think Squeezely can invest more in new customers to help them to get asap up and running with the platform to help with the installation.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalization of the webshop is the biggest problem solver. We hope to get different conversion and lifetime buyers if we get true all the options the platform offers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: The most valuable part of Squeeely is the quick response you get on bugs or support. The team of Squeezely is very social so to contact them is always very joyful.

I think Squeezely can invest more in new customers to help them to get asap up and running with the platform to help with the installation.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Personalization of the webshop is the biggest problem solver. We hope to get different conversion and lifetime buyers if we get true all the options the platform offers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Great tool for personalisation with endless possibilities. The support is very fast and helpful. We achieved great results with the tool.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
The overview of personalisations is sometimes a bit cluttered.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Squeezely to communicate relevantly, focusing on conversion, return and customer satisfaction. The use of Squeezely enables us to make media communications more relevant, websites more personal an realize more turnover with data.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Great tool for personalisation with endless possibilities. The support is very fast and helpful. We achieved great results with the tool.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: The overview of personalisations is sometimes a bit cluttered.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We use Squeezely to communicate relevantly, focusing on conversion, return and customer satisfaction. The use of Squeezely enables us to make media communications more relevant, websites more personal an realize more turnover with data.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great customer data platform with built in personalization features
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
We have used Squeezely to identify customers when they visit our website or offline stores. This gives us a centralized view of our customers. Using Squeezely we are able to reach these customers with personalized content on our website, via email and also in ads. In doing so it really has made our customer experience a lot smarter and better.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
You do need some knowledge about marketing and websites to set this up. Squeezely offers a really good onboarding program with dedicated customer success portal. But to get everything setup it is helpful that you at least have some basic knowledge about HTML & CSS.

Recommendations to others considering Spotler Activate:
It really helped us do a lot as a small company in very little time. Squeezely's support has been great in helping us getting started and made us less reliant on our website development partners.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
For example, website visitors that are viewing products that are not in stock can get automatic reminders when a product is available again. Returning customers get strong product recommendations related to the product category they visit and also see similar products in the checkout.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: We have used Squeezely to identify customers when they visit our website or offline stores. This gives us a centralized view of our customers. Using Squeezely we are able to reach these customers with personalized content on our website, via email and also in ads. In doing so it really has made our customer experience a lot smarter and better.

review_question_answers.answer: You do need some knowledge about marketing and websites to set this up. Squeezely offers a really good onboarding program with dedicated customer success portal. But to get everything setup it is helpful that you at least have some basic knowledge about HTML & CSS.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: For example, website visitors that are viewing products that are not in stock can get automatic reminders when a product is available again. Returning customers get strong product recommendations related to the product category they visit and also see similar products in the checkout.

initial_reviews.review_title: Decent tool for customer data management
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Squeezely is an easy to use tool for customer data management

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Sometimes we ran into a bug, however whenever we contacted support those issues where resolved quickly

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Import of customer list data in ad platforms, Conversion API for extra conversion data

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Squeezely is an easy to use tool for customer data management

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes we ran into a bug, however whenever we contacted support those issues where resolved quickly

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Import of customer list data in ad platforms, Conversion API for extra conversion data

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Sr. Advertising Specialist & Online Marketing Strategist

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Personalization options, tracking options, connections with Copernica, Magento2.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Usability; switching between merchants could be better.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Connecting customer data from different platforms.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Personalization options, tracking options, connections with Copernica, Magento2.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Usability; switching between merchants could be better.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Connecting customer data from different platforms.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best software to maintain and collect data
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Best thing about this software is it provides campain management, diving customers according to segments and it has also the features of personalization.
It has many other good features.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Sometimes it is bit difficult to copy data and other things from one account to another and it's dashboard also have many limitations.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
It provides me a user friendly interface and support with result driven personalization.
It has option to approach clients in more personalized way by bringing together with synchronisation.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer:
Best thing about this software is it provides campain management, diving customers according to segments and it has also the features of personalization.
It has many other good features.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes it is bit difficult to copy data and other things from one account to another and it's dashboard also have many limitations.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
It provides me a user friendly interface and support with result driven personalization.
It has option to approach clients in more personalized way by bringing together with synchronisation.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
We have been using Squeezely for over a year and are amazed how advanced it is. We can easily show our clients boats that they are interested in. It's all based on data and click behavior on our boat auction website. We know what our customers are interested in. By using personalizations, we have been able to improve our conversion rate considerably.
A friendly team and helpful helpdesk make this advanced data program worthwhile.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Make some extra video's how to use the advanced features.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dubble the conversion rate.
Presenting the customer products they are looking for.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer:
We have been using Squeezely for over a year and are amazed how advanced it is. We can easily show our clients boats that they are interested in. It's all based on data and click behavior on our boat auction website. We know what our customers are interested in. By using personalizations, we have been able to improve our conversion rate considerably.
A friendly team and helpful helpdesk make this advanced data program worthwhile.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Make some extra video's how to use the advanced features.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Dubble the conversion rate.
Presenting the customer products they are looking for.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great program, easy to use. Personal help is always on point.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
It is very easy to make new journeys and personalisations. Besides that, it is easy to connect Copernica!

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
There is nothing that I dislike about Squeezely.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting a good and clear 360 customer profile and making our website more personal for our customers.

review_question_answers.answer: It is very easy to make new journeys and personalisations. Besides that, it is easy to connect Copernica!

review_question_answers.answer: There is nothing that I dislike about Squeezely.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Getting a good and clear 360 customer profile and making our website more personal for our customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
It's very easy to use and implement myself. Support whenever needed was great.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
I liked the freedom, but I can understand if this freedom is a bit much at first.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has become a lot easier to get my data and enrich the sample.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: It's very easy to use and implement myself. Support whenever needed was great.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It has become a lot easier to get my data and enrich the sample.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Workspace is low key, easy to understand and clearly structured. Customer service is easily accessible and helpful.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
In the short time we're working with this tool we haven't discovered any big disadvantages yet.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
We want to send our customers more personalized e-mails with products tailored to their wishes & we want to personalize our website.

review_question_answers.answer: In the short time we're working with this tool we haven't discovered any big disadvantages yet.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We want to send our customers more personalized e-mails with products tailored to their wishes & we want to personalize our website.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great value for money personalization platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Easy integration, good support and no frills

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Audience synch to Facebook and Google Ads need som custom steps in order to work for some audiences

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeting on-site messages to specific audiences

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Easy integration, good support and no frills

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Audience synch to Facebook and Google Ads need som custom steps in order to work for some audiences

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Targeting on-site messages to specific audiences

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Ability to provide a personalized shopping experience to customers

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
I had/have trouble with finding information about the different tools. This informations would be helpfull in order to make more effective use of Squeezely

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalized shopping experience

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Ability to provide a personalized shopping experience to customers

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: I had/have trouble with finding information about the different tools. This informations would be helpfull in order to make more effective use of Squeezely

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Personalized shopping experience

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Quick to setup, it provides valuable insights connecting dots from multiple sources. Super flexible segmentation and very powerful in orchestrating specific actions to specific targets. Too cheap compared to what it provides in my view.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Getting help can take some time, unless you deal with one of their resellers. Some features are very advanced and require more explanation, inline help with examples would help, as long as preset templates/workflows

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting first-party data and insights to optimized advertising spending and to increase conversion rate through hyper-personalization

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Quick to setup, it provides valuable insights connecting dots from multiple sources. Super flexible segmentation and very powerful in orchestrating specific actions to specific targets. Too cheap compared to what it provides in my view.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
review_question_answers.answer: Getting help can take some time, unless you deal with one of their resellers. Some features are very advanced and require more explanation, inline help with examples would help, as long as preset templates/workflows

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Getting first-party data and insights to optimized advertising spending and to increase conversion rate through hyper-personalization

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
We have been using Squeezely for over a year and are amazed how advanced it is. We can easily show our clients boats that they are interested in. It's all based on data and click behavior on our boat auction website. We know what our customers are interested in. By using personalizations, we have been able to improve our conversion rate considerably.
A friendly team and helpful helpdesk make this advanced data program worthwhile.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Make some extra video's how to use the advanced features.

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dubble the conversion rate.
Presenting the customer products they are looking for.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Activate?
Quick to setup, it provides valuable insights connecting dots from multiple sources. Super flexible segmentation and very powerful in orchestrating specific actions to specific targets. Too cheap compared to what it provides in my view.

What do you dislike about Spotler Activate?
Getting help can take some time, unless you deal with one of their resellers. Some features are very advanced and require more explanation, inline help with examples would help, as long as preset templates/workflows

What problems is Spotler Activate solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting first-party data and insights to optimized advertising spending and to increase conversion rate through hyper-personalization
